column5: Hello All,Been a fun couple of weeks of whitetail buck photography. This year I was given permission to roam privately leased NCC farm land here in Ottawa. In two weeks I have found 16 different bucks - and the action is just getting started.Here is some trail camera footage from Oct. 15 - 17th. Biggest buck I have found is an 11-point, but plenty of nice wide 8's around.  No hunting allowed on this land, so unless they stray far, these guys should be safe for the season.   (watch in 1080p HD for best quality)Cheers,  Justin
Here are a few images from the past two weeks. The scrap was more of a play fight. These guys won't be friends for long, lol.        Cheers,  Justin
Very nice coverage bud.  So did you get my email?    You know,the one that asked if my tree stand was up yet? LOL
Just working on the colour scheme and seating configuration while we speak, Brian...  Cheers,  Justin
That's cool.  Like the sound too.
Nice Justin!  I'll be out that way on the 6th and 7th for some whitetail action
Thanks, Glen...  Best of luck, Bill! No shortage of deer out this way, that's for sure.  Cheers,  Justin
